    • Constructor Detail

      • AutoCSA

        public AutoCSA(java.lang.String sts,
       java.lang.String refseq,
       boolean reverse,
       int refStart,
       int refEnd)
        Constructor for AutoCSA.
        Parameters:
        sts - sts name
        refseq - sts amplimer sequence (supply in sense direction)
        reverse - boolean indicating whether an anti-sense trace(s)
        refStart - base number to start analysis
        refEnd - base number to finish analysis

    • Method Detail

      • getCSAVersion

        public java.lang.String getCSAVersion()
        Returns the version of AutoCSA.

      • setCSAParameters

        public void setCSAParameters(CSAParameters params)
        Set the CSA analysis and comparison parameters.
        Parameters:
        params - input CSAParameters bean to override the defaults

      • analyseTrace

        public SeqTraceAnalysis analyseTrace(Trace trace,
                            int minAmp,
                            int minDist,
                            java.lang.String traceID,
                            boolean isNormal)
                              throws BadTraceException
        Perform a CSA analysis step on the suplied trace.
        Parameters:
        trace - Trace object specifying input trace
        minAmp - NOT relevant (unused)
        minDist - minimum allowed distance between peaks (in scans)
        traceID - identifier for the trace
        isNormal - boolean indicating whether Trace is a Normal
        Returns:
        traceAnalysis SeqTraceAnalysis object
        Throws:
        BadTraceException - If 1 or more Channels contains zero peaks

      • writeAnalysisTables

        public void writeAnalysisTables(java.lang.String idNormal,
                       java.lang.String idSample)
        Outputs plain text files containing columns of trace analysis parameters.
        Parameters:
        idNormal - Identifier for Normal trace
        idSample - Identifier for Sample trace

      • doCSAAnalysis

        public SeqTraceAnalysis doCSAAnalysis(Trace trace,
                             java.lang.String traceID,
                             int minAmp,
                             int minDist,
                             boolean isNormal)
                               throws BadTraceException
        Top level caller for CSA trace analysis.
        Parameters:
        trace - Trace object specifying input trace
        traceID - identifier for the trace
        minAmp - NOT relevant (unused)
        minDist - minimum allowed distance between peaks (in scans)
        isNormal - boolean indicating whether Trace is a Normal
        Returns:
        traceAnalysis SeqTraceAnalysis object
        Throws:
        BadTraceException - If 1 or more Channels contains zero peaks

      • setAnalyses

        public void setAnalyses(SeqTraceAnalysis cTraceAnal,
               SeqTraceAnalysis sTraceAnal)
        Sets the CSA analysis objects for the autoCSA class.
        Parameters:
        cTraceAnal - the Normal analysis object
        sTraceAnal - the Sample analysis object

      • setupAutoCSA

        public SeqTraceComparison setupAutoCSA(SeqTraceAnalysis cTraceAnal,
                              SeqTraceAnalysis sTraceAnal)
        Setup method defines a comparison object from individual analyses.
        Parameters:
        cTraceAnal - the Normal analysis object
        sTraceAnal - the Sample analysis object
        Returns:
        comparison the SeqTraceComparison object

      • runAutoCSA

        public void runAutoCSA(SeqTraceComparison comparison)
        Runs the autoCSA comparison step, normalises and calculates peak drops.
        Parameters:
        comparison - the SeqTraceComparison object

      • setROICoords

        public void setROICoords(int start,
                int end)
        Sets a Region of Interest (ROI) for the amplimer in which to optimize the data analysis.
        Parameters:
        start - the start base number for the ROI
        end - the finish base number for the ROI

      • mutationScan

        public void mutationScan(SeqTraceComparison comparison)
        Performs a search for all mutation types on the SeqTraceComparison object.
        Parameters:
        comparison - the SeqTraceComparison to analyse
